solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    int max = 0;--newline--    --newline--    public int diameterOfBinaryTree(TreeNode root) {--newline--        maxDepth(root);--newline--        return max;--newline--    }--newline--    --newline--    private int maxDepth(TreeNode root) {--newline--        if (root == null) return 0;--newline--        --newline--        int left = maxDepth(root.left);--newline--        int right = maxDepth(root.right);--newline--        --newline--        max = Math.max(max, left + right);--newline--        --newline--        return Math.max(left, right) + 1;--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
